Reviews.Title: “Where Service tops Location!”
Reviews.Author: Pablo_Contreras_R
Reviews.Content: hotel located steps bus station close metro station despite location busiest avenues converge hotel extremely quiet entire staff extremely courteous knowledgable times willing assist smile front desk staff bell boys service restaurant staff fantastic met demanding treated children super stars food reasonable priced hotel twice happen gm organized trained team kudos

Reviews.Title: “Fair hotel, just a place to sleep for business travellers”
Reviews.Author: Luz1980
Reviews.Content: fiesta inn insurgentes ok hotel plan sleep night day breakfast heading day meetings business events it´s fairly located you´re doing business wtc short stroll metro metrobus stations average wireless internet didn´t bed night found sheets holes bed comforter comforter pillows looked dirty worn issue bathtub deep half time hot water warm instead hot sound maintenance people i´m won´t people rely comfortable bath relax sore muscles day plus bathroom tub nice detailed view toilet bowl taking bath depressing day shower didn´t wash hair water bottom tap hair sucked drain eventually stop sucking save hair damaged cut mornings housekeeping staff loud sundays saturdays plan getting quality sleep 7am plus there´s alarm clock there´s fear getting wake call oversleeping expect business hotel planning reservations hotel don´t look internal foyer actually daylight cold warm sunny raining outside internal don´t daylight staff nice helpful breakfast food fine service notsogood forever meal arrived cold
